alert.note: Alert for Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 8:22PM MDT until June 06 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL BIG HORN COUNTY... At 821 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Hardin, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. At 755 PM, ping pong size hail was reported just west of Hardin. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Big Horn County. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
